gamerule.hero-statue$allowPlayerChangeSt: Allow Players to change Hero Statue pose by interacting
gamerule.hero-statue$allowRedstoneChange: Allow Redstone to change Hero Statue pose
hero-statue.title: Hero Statue
hero-statue.render_type.fancy.hover: The recommended option! Renders models using custom core shaders.
hero-statue.render_type.fast.hover: Renders model using vanilla shaders. This will prevent §4R§6A§eI§aN§9B§dO§5W§r MODE, and any other custom effects from being rendered.
hero-statue.render_type.faster.hover: Renders model using Item Renderer, it's faster, but you won't get poses.
hero-statue.render_type.off.hover: You may have all the frames, but won't see the statue... Held Item will still be rendered.
hero-statue.eye_overlay.hover: When disabled, prevents the eye overlay from rendering.
